Title: Synchrony
Plot: A case involving a strange old man warning two scientists of events in the immediate future which come to pass (and the use of their experimental flash-freezing compound that does not exist yet) has Mulder believing that one of the scientists has come from the future to stop his own scientific breakthrough from becoming reality.
GuestStars: Joseph Fuqua, Susan Lee Hoffman, Michael Fairman, Jed Rees, Hiro Kanagawa, Jonathan Walker, Alison Matthews, Norman Armour, Patricia Idlette, Brent Chapman, Terry Arrowsmith, Aurelio Dinunzio, Austin Basile
